data.title: American Music & Sound
data.meta_site_name: American Music & Sound | An Exertis JAM Business
data.text:
Who we are:

Our team of dedicated account managers consists of industry thought leaders, world-class audio engineers and musicians, subject matter experts, marketing veterans and sales powerhouses. As an extension of top MI and Pro Audio brands around the world, we provide an unrivaled knowledge of the US market, a clear vision of trends in the technological landscape, and an innovative approach to building brands to unseen heights.
